# Resume entries

```{r}
#| output: asis

library(typstcv)
library(dplyr)

tribble(
  ~title, ~location, ~date, ~description, ~details,
  
  "Title", 
  "Location", 
  "01--02 Jan 2025",
  "Date input here with '--'",
  "Detail which uses an em-dash---lovely! But still not **bold**."
) |>
  resume_entry(details = "details")
```
